summary: Abandoned by his father at an early age, Jim MacLaine (David Essex) seems to have inherited the old man's restlessness. Despite his apparent intelligence, Jim decides not to take the exams ... See full summary »
cast: David Essex|Ringo Starr|Rosemary Leach|James Booth|Billy Fury|Keith Moon|Rosalind Ayres|Brenda Bruce|Robert Lindsay|Verna Harvey|James Ottaway|Deborah Watling|Beth Morris|Daphne Oxenford|Kim Braden|Ron Hackett|Johnny Shannon|Karl Howman|Patti Love|Sue Holderness|Sally Watts|Valerie Lush|Alan Foss|Natalie Kent|Patsy Blower|Sara Clee|Peggy Aitchison|Bernard Severn|Eugene Wallace|Erin Geraghty|Tony McHale|Paul Vaughan-Teague|Peter Turner|Sacha Puttnam|Graham Bond|Rick Lester
title: Ese será el día
